Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • elements.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a Camera, as the viewer of a Scene.

      • constructRayThroughPixel

        public Ray constructRayThroughPixel(int nX,
                                    int nY,
                                    double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double screenDistance,
                                    double screenWidth,
                                    double screenHeight)
        Parameters:
        nX - - number of pixels at X plane.
        nY - - number of pixels at Y plane.
        x - - pixel at X plane.
        y - - pixel at Y plane.
        screenDistance - - distance between viewer and scene.
        screenWidth - - width of the view plane.
        screenHeight - - height of the view plane.
        Returns:
        a ray from P0 of the camera(viewer) to a point P(direction calculated as a Vector)
